article.title: Bilskirnir
article.paragraph: Bilskrnir(Old Norse"bright-crack" (poetic)Orchard (1997:20).) is the hall of the godThor or rrinNorse mythology. Here he lives with his wifeSfand their children. According toGrmnisml, the hall is the greatest of buildings and contains 540 rooms, located inAsgar, as are all the dwellings of thesirgods, in the kingdom ofrheimr(orrvangaraccording toGylfaginningandYnglinga saga).
article.heading: Modern influence

list.listitem: The hall inspired the name of anAsgard (Stargate)Asgardstarshipcommanded byThor (Stargate)Supreme Commander Thor, in the television seriesStargate SG-1namedBeliskner.
There is aNational Socialist black metalNSBMband fromHesse,Germanynamed Bilskirnir.
